detailResultFields.label: Course Section Definition Public Notes
detailResultFields.value: PHYS 216 pre-reqs: PHYS 106 has replaced PHYS 107 and is also suitable as a pre-requisite. Please get in touch with ugcoord@phas.ubc.ca with registration queries.

detailResultFields.label: Course Section Definition Public Notes
detailResultFields.value: IMPORTANT 24W Note: PHYS 229 T2A has NO meeting time/location or required attendance. However, registration IS required in tutorial to complete enrollment in course, but will not impact your schedule/timetable. In-Person attendance is required for all labs.

uiLabels.WDRES.FACETEDSEARCH.SymanSyntax:
Boolean logic can be expressed using AND, OR, NOT, and (). 
Exact phrases can be surrounded by double quotation marks. 
Example: ("software engineer" OR computer science) AND ~manager~.
